polynomial.title: Polynomial
polynomial.text: A polynomial is an algebraic expression that consists of constants and multiples of variables and their powers. An example would be 5x3−2x2+x+4.

function.title: Function
function.text: A function is a mathematical relation that converts inputs (x) into outputs (y). They are often expressed as mathematical equations of the form fx.

derivative.title: Derivative of a function
derivative.text: The derivative of a function of a real variable measures the sensitivity to change of the function value (output value) with respect to a change in its argument (input value). The derivative of a function of a single variable at a chosen input value, when it exists, is the slope of the tangent line to the graph of the function at that point.
